title: Clipboard to smart wear watch
summary: Quick and easy to Save and manage copy paste text and notes to your android wear
description: Save a history of your clipboard to your android wear and easily retrieve it just by long pressing on the text from your android wear without navigating out of the app. Quickly create notes without opening another app. Just copy the text you want to save and you are done.Important note: all clipboard history / copy pasted text are only stored locally to preseve the user's privacy.Permissions:Internet: required for ads. (Please bear with me on this)Network & wifi status: required for ads. Tested on:Motorola's Moto 360 smart watchLG GwatchNexus 6Lollipo 5.1.1Brought to you by the maker of wear finder
descriptionHTML:
Save a history of your clipboard to your android wear and easily retrieve it just by long pressing on the text from your android wear without navigating out of the app.

Quickly create notes without opening another app. Just copy the text you want to save and you are done.

Important note:
all clipboard history / copy pasted text are only stored locally to preseve the user's privacy.

Permissions:
Internet: required for ads. (Please bear with me on this)
Network & wifi status: required for ads.


Tested on:
Motorola's Moto 360 smart watch
LG Gwatch
Nexus 6
Lollipo 5.1.1

Brought to you by the maker of wear finder

Useful app. I really like the connectivity to the smart watch.
App has many features that are usefull
